component.name: img2mp4
component.summary: Convert image series to video with timecode as subtitle

description.p: img2mp4 is a command-line tool that converts a series of images into a video file with timecode subtitles extracted from EXIF data or file modification times.

ul.li: Automatic timecode extraction from EXIF metadata or file modification times
Flexible image resizing with support for common resolutions (1080p, 4K, etc.)
EXIF metadata preservation - copies metadata from source images to output video
Automatic timezone detection from system settings
Directory support - process all images in a directory with natural sorting
Two implementations - Python and Bash versions available
Convert image series to video with timecode subtitles
Support for H.264, H.265, and VP9 codecs
Delete option to remove source files after conversion
